entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
